directions: Pour the margarita mix, mangosteen juice, and rum into a blender or bowl of a food processor. Blend until smooth. Gradually add the frozen fruit, and continue blending. Pour the mixture into four tall glasses and garnish with mango slices.
ingredients: 1 (10 fluid ounce) can frozen margarita mix
1 ripe mango - peeled and sliced, for garnish
title: Mangosteen Margarita
